price: 难道他们没有看见在空中被制服的群鸟吗？只有安拉维持它们；对于信道的民众，此中确有许多迹象。
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ مُسَخَّرَٰتٖ فِي جَوِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri musakharātin fī jawwi al-samāi mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-lahu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
